KIDS' STAR RUNNER 2 SNEAKER GRADE SCHOOL.name: KIDS' STAR RUNNER 2 SNEAKER GRADE SCHOOL
KIDS' STAR RUNNER 2 SNEAKER GRADE SCHOOL.detail: You always help them reach their potential the Star Runner 2 Running Shoe from Nike Leather and stretch fabric upper in a running shoe style with a round toe Lace up entry for a secure fit with stretch material for flexibility and a natural feel Padded collar and tongue for added support Logo detailing Soft lining with foam cushioned comfort footbed Durable rubber traction outsole

MEN`S QUEST RUNNING SHOE.name: MEN'S QUEST RUNNING SHOE
MEN`S QUEST RUNNING SHOE.detail: It’s about the journey in the Quest Running Shoe from Nike. Breathable mesh upper in a running shoe style with a round toe Lace up entry with locked down panels Cushioned comfort collar and tongue Logo brand detailing Soft fabric lining with a cushioned comfort footbed Foam midsole for added support Durable traction outsole

PRECISION 2 BASKETBALL SHOE.name: PRECISION 2 BASKETBALL SHOE
PRECISION 2 BASKETBALL SHOE.detail: Gain an advantage in the Precision 2 Basketball Shoe from Nike. Breathable mesh fabric upper in a basketball shoe style with a round toe Lace up entry for a secure fit Cushioned collar and tongue Logo print detailing Soft fabric lining with a cushioned comfort footbed Air unit in heel with phylon midsole for increased support on landings Internal midfoot shank Rubber outsole in a herringbone tread for durable traction

MEN`S VS HOOPS 2.0 HIGH TOP SNEAKER.name: MEN'S VS HOOPS 2.0 HIGH TOP SNEAKER
MEN`S VS HOOPS 2.0 HIGH TOP SNEAKER.detail: Shoot and score a style win with the VS Hoops 2.0 High Top Sneaker from adidas. Synthetic and textile upper in a sneaker style with a round toe Lace-up closure for a secure fit Cushioned collar and tongue for added support Classic 3 stripes with logo detailing Soft fabric lining with comfort footbed Rubber cupsole

MEN'S RENEW RUN RUNNING.name: MEN'S RENEW RUN RUNNING SHOE
MEN'S RENEW RUN RUNNING.detail: Get support and comfort on-the-go in the Men's Nike Renew Run Running Shoe. Breathable mesh upper in a running sneaker style Lace-up closure Padded collar and tongue for increased comfort TPU-outlined Swoosh design trademark Soft lining with cushioned insole Dual-density midsole gives you a soft, cushioned ride with Lunar foam underfoot Durable rubber outsole
